DOC.brief_summary: To assess multiple-dose pharmacokinetics ( PK ) , safety tolerability AVP-786 ( deuterated [ d6 ] dextromethorphan hydrobromide [ DM ] /quinidine sulfate [ Q ] ) healthy volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase-1 Study Assess Pharmacokinetics , Safety Tolerability AVP-786 Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult male 18 45 year age BMI 18 30 kg/m2 History presence significant disease History substance abuse and/or alcohol abuse past 3 year Use tobaccocontaining nicotinecontaining product within 6 month Use prescription overthecounter medication within 14 day
